tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE concert_schedules (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    concert_date DATE NOT NULL,
    musician_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(musician_id)
);

CREATE TABLE concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    musician_id INT NOT NULL,
    venue VARCHAR(100),
    concert_date DATE,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
    tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    musician_id INT NOT NULL,
    tour_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
    artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    artist_genre VARCHAR(50),
    artist_label VARCHAR(50),
    artist_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE albums (
    album_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    album_artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
    album_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    album_release_date DATE,
    album_genre VARCHAR(50),
    album_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    song_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    song_artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
    song_album_id UUID REFERENCES albums(album_id),
    song_duration TIME,
    song_lyrics TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE concerts (
    concert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
    concert_location VARCHAR(100),
    concert_date DATE,
    concert_ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    concert_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
    tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id)
);
